headline: Direct Relief and FedEx Respond to Texas Flooding With Critical Medical Aid
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / July 18, 2025 / When severe flooding struck Texas, homes were destroyed, roads were impassable, and access to medical care became critical. In response, Direct Relief quickly mobilized to support healthcare providers ...

headline: FedEx executive Sriram Krishnasamy steps down, moves into advisory role
summary: Sriram Krishnasamy had served as FedEx's executive vice president, chief digital and information officer, and chief transformation officer.

raw.headline: FedEx executive Sriram Krishnasamy steps down, moves into advisory role
raw.summary: Sriram Krishnasamy had served as FedEx's executive vice president, chief digital and information officer, and chief transformation officer.

headline: FedEx and UPS cease parcel discounts, ‘weaponize’ fuel surcharges: report
summary: Many businesses are diverting parcel shipments to cheaper carriers as FedEx and UPS hike rates and surcharges, according to the latest TD Cowen/AFS Freight Index. The post FedEx and UPS cease parcel discounts, ‘weaponize’ fuel surcharges: report appeared first on FreightWaves.

raw.headline: FedEx and UPS cease parcel discounts, ‘weaponize’ fuel surcharges: report
raw.summary: Many businesses are diverting parcel shipments to cheaper carriers as FedEx and UPS hike rates and surcharges, according to the latest TD Cowen/AFS Freight Index. The post FedEx and UPS cease parcel discounts, ‘weaponize’ fuel surcharges: report appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: FedEx tech, transformation chief abruptly exits
summary: After one year in the role, Sriram Krishnasamy departed the company Thursday. He will remain with FedEx in an adviser capacity until the fall.

raw.headline: FedEx tech, transformation chief abruptly exits
